reviews.review_msg: First, the lectures are very interactive. Makes you feel like you're in a book-club. Loved the texts chosen for this course and even ENG114. Tough grader but makes you stay motivated all through the lectures. Very helpful and knowledgeable. Highly recommend for any literature courses.

He is a great person, he's passionate and friendly, his class is easy if you are open-minded enough. Essay grading could be confusing, I understand what he wants to see in the essay but I need time practicing my writing. Still wonder why he looks familiar, maybe Robert Downey Jr has a side job when he doesn't grow his beard (jk).

Being a science major, I hate English, yet somehow Dr. Solomon's lectures are so great that I magically like drama plays now. Definitely take classes with her if you lack a passion for English and are just taking this for an elective. She will change the way you think. Her final was extremely easy, although the papers were marked more harshly.
